TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer that occurs in both of a pair of organs, such as both breasts, ovaries, eyes, lungs, kidneys, or adrenal glands, at the same time.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer que se presenta al mismo tiempo en ambos órganos de un par, como en ambas mamas, ovarios, ojos, pulmones, riñones o glándulas suprarrenales.
